characterInfo.Aliases: Nalan'Elin, Nalan, Nin, Nakku, the Judge
characterInfo.Appears in: The Way of Kings, Words of Radiance, Arcanum Unbounded, Edgedancer, Oathbringer, Rhythm of War

characterDescription:
Nale is one of the ten Heralds of the Almighty. He is associated with the number Nan, the essence Vapor and the divine attributes Just and Confident. He is the Herald of Justice and the reluctant, but eventually acceptant, patron Herald of the order of Knights Radiant known as Skybreakers. He is the only Herald to have joined his own order.
He is known as Nalan'Elin or Nalan in Vorinism, and Nin amongst the Shin. Further, Lift calls out to him as both Nakku and the Judge.
